## VectorBuilder.random() method

Constructs a vector whose entries are (uniformly-distributed) random numbers between `min` and `max`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
random(dimension: number, min?: number, max?: number): V;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dimension | <code>number</code> | The dimension of the new vector |
|  min | <code>number</code> | The lower limit of the random numbers to include |
|  max | <code>number</code> | The upper limit of the random numbers to include |

<b>Returns:</b>

`V`
